entities.name: vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as a person who is fighting with Harry and gasping for breath. He has a stick and is trying to control the situation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who is being controlled by Uncle Vernon and is trying to escape from his cupboard.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as someone who needs to go away so Harry can receive the letters.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon has control over Harry and is trying to keep him in his cupboard.
Harry's actions are influenced by the fact that Dudley needs to go away so he can receive the letters.
